About
Us

Welcome to DEKY MEDIA In today's fast-paced business landscape, staying ahead of the curve is crucial. At DEKY MEDIA, we believe that the key to unlocking your organization's full potential lies in empowering your most valuable asset: your people. Our mission is to help you fulfill your goals through innovative training and consulting solutions.

Our Story

We were founded on the principle that every business deserves to thrive. Our team of experts, with years of experience in human and organizational development, technology, and soft skills training, came together to create a unique solution that addresses the most pressing challenges businesses face. We are passionate about helping organizations like yours achieve exponential growth, boost productivity, and increase efficiency.

Our Mission

Through cutting-edge technology and soft skills training, as well as expert human resources services, we are dedicated to transforming your workforce into a high-performing, adaptable, and innovative team. We believe that by harnessing the power of technology, human potential, and creative connections, we can help you fulfill your goals

Our Vision

At DEKY MEDIA, we are driven by a bold vision: to significantly reduce the unemployment rate in Nigeria, especially among youth, by providing them with the skills and training necessary to succeed in the modern workforce. We believe that every individual deserves access to quality training, resources, and opportunities to succeed.

Our Values

We are guided by the following core values:

  • Empowerment: We believe in empowering individuals and organizations to reach their full potential.
  • Innovation: We are committed to staying ahead of the curve, embracing new ideas, and driving innovation.
  • Integrity: We operate with transparency, honesty, and integrity, building trust with our clients, partners, and community.
  • Excellence: We strive for excellence in everything we do, delivering high-quality services and solutions that exceed expectations.

Our Approach

We take a holistic approach to business growth, recognizing that every organization is unique. Our expert trainers, coaches, and consultants work closely with you to:

  • Identify areas for improvement
  • Develop customized training programs
  • Implement effective human resources strategies
  • Provide ongoing support and evaluation

Our Platform

We leverage various platforms to deliver our services, including:

  • Digital training platforms: We utilize online platforms to deliver training programs, making them accessible to a wider audience.
  • Social media engagement: We engage with our audience on social media, providing valuable resources, insights, and support.
  • Podcasting and video content: We create informative and engaging content, sharing our expertise and showcasing success stories.

What We Mean by "Media"

At DEKY MEDIA, we do not just think of media as traditional channels like newspapers, radio, or TV. For us, "media" represents the pathways and platforms that connect people, facilitate growth, and empower individuals and organizations. We are committed to leveraging these pathways to help our clients succeed.

Our Goals

We are committed to achieving the following goals:

  • Reduce unemployment: Reduce the unemployment rate in Nigeria by 10% within the next 5 years
  • Train 10,000 youth: Provide training and skills development opportunities to 10,000 Nigerian youth within the next 3 years.
  • Partner with 500 businesses: Collaborate with 500 Nigerian businesses to provide them with skilled and competent workforce.
  • Achieve 90% client satisfaction: Maintain a client satisfaction rate of 90% or higher through our services.

Join Our Community

At DEKY MEDIA, we are more than just a training and consulting firm; we are a community of like-minded professionals passionate about business growth, youth empowerment, and national development.
